title: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
content: Kinda want to get one. Has a crazy back story associated with it. Those are the best converstion pieces. Reminds me of the NORFED pieces that were hallmarked after being returned. https://www.justice.gov/usao-sdny/pr/us-attorney-announces-historic-336-billion-cryptocurrency-seizure-and-conviction?fbclid=IwAR3J3lrwG7guk15t-zobh_kFhvYeAgcmi_9DN8SohlPPe7DwRIQxMHo5KOU

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: too bad all the Bitcoin wont be returned to the owner - Ross.

comments.author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.created_time: November 08, 2022, 04:10:48 PMLast edit: November 08, 2022, 04:30:11 PM by CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.body: Group buy!!!! haha. I'm thinking he has a few 10 bitcoin rounds in there. What are those going for right now?

comments.body: Thanks owlcatz!okay looks like mostly 25btc rounds and a roll of 1btc.

I didn't know they took physical coins during the raid until recently.

comments.author: Ballhog69
comments.body: sending 825 btc to the government  Interesting they said whether they seized them or were willingly sent for each batch

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Quote from: owlcatz on November 08, 2022, 04:18:47 PMPics here...  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5419807.msg61256811#msg61256811Apologies- missed this post - doh I wonder if they’ll sell loaded or will peel ?Do they know how to redeem them ?So many questions??

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: Mbitr on November 08, 2022, 05:02:27 PMApologies- missed this post - doh I wonder if they’ll sell loaded or will peel ?Do they know how to redeem them ?So many questions?? No idea, but I'm sure they know what they are doing... The thing that is odd to me is they said "25 Cas coins" worth like 174 BTC, but this pic appears to show 6 x 25 BTC coins, plus 2 more singles and halves, plus whatever is in that roll...I think they are confused on the numbers or something there... but then again, i can't really see the pics that well...
